title: Heavily pregnant Rebekah Vardy in tears landing in UK following Coleen Rooney row
text:

Rebekah Vardy was seen in tears as she arrived back in the UK after her row with Coleen Rooney.

The WAG, 37, looked emotional as she touched down in Heathrow airport on Saturday.

She was joined by her husband Jamie Vardy, 32, who protectively held her hand as they left the terminal.

Rebekah, who is seven months pregnant, was dressed comfortably in a grey tracksuit with red and white stripes, which she teamed with a pair of matching trainers and a black backpack.

She was seen wiping her eyes and nose as she followed their security guard through the airport.

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

Jamie sported an all-black tracksuit and grey trainers, also carrying a grey rucksack on his back.

He looked forlorn as he led her out of the terminal building.

The couple had been on a family holiday to Dubai when the Coleen drama emerged.

Coleen broke the internet when she accused Becky of leaking stories about her to the press last week.

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

After suspecting Rebekah, Coleen, who is married to Wayne Rooney, says she leaked a series of fake stories that only Rebekah's account could see on Instagram to test whether or not they'd make it to the papers.

And when they did, she revealed her detective work - that saw her nicknamed Wagatha Christie - in an epic statement that went viral on social media.

And Coleen is said to be preparing for Rebekah to confront her about it.

(Image: SplashNews.com)

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

A friend of the star told the Mail on Sunday : "Coleen’s view is, 'Bring it on'. She has got the evidence – it’s all there.

"Coleen’s evidence is bulletproof and she stands by it all. If Rebekah wants to sue, she’s welcome to.

"Coleen will fight her and the proof is there. If it’s in court, it’s not ideal but Coleen will follow it through."

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

After it all kicked off, Rebekah hit back in her own statement.

She wrote: "As I have just said to you on the phone, I wish you had called me if you thought this.

"I never speak to anyone about you as various journalists who have asked me to over the years can vouch for.

"If you thought this was happening you could have told me & I could have changed my passwords to see if it stopped.

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

(Image: AJM/RPPIX / SplashNews.com)

"Over the years various people have had access to my insta & just this week I found I was following people I didn't know and have never followed myself.

"I'm not being funny but I don't need the money, what would I gain from selling stories on you?

"I liked you a lot Coleen & I'm so upset that you have chosen to do this, especially when I'm heavily pregnant.

"I'm disgusted that I'm even having to deny this. You should have called me the first time this happened."
description: The WAG, 37, looked emotional as she touched down at Heathrow airport with her husband Jamie Vardy, 32
